articles.title: European Parliament ban will 'negatively affect' energy discussions, warns gas-rich Doha - The Telegraph
articles.description: Gulf state denies involvement in a bribery scandal after raids found £‎1.3m suspected to have been used by Doha to buy influence in Brussels
articles.content:
Qatar has warned that discussions on energy co-operation will be "negatively affected" by its ban from the European parliament amid a bribery scandal.

articles.title: Gareth Southgate to remain England manager, Football Association confirms - Sky Sports
articles.description: Gareth Southgate will stay on as England manager until the 2024 European Championships, the Football Association has confirmed.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ulster Fans Question Why La Rochelle Fans Were In The Aviva Stadium For Clash - Balls.ie
articles.description: Ulster fans were left unhappy as La Rochelle fans were in attendance at the Aviva Stadium in their 36-29 defeat to the European champions
articles.content:

articles.title: World Cup: Croatia wear down fatigued Morocco to win third place - The Straits Times
articles.description:
